qas.question: Who fell overboard from Kerry's boat?
What medal did Kerry earn for rescuing Rassmann?

answers.text: the Bronze Star Medal with Combat "V"

qas.question: What does the Combat V mean?

context: <a1_0>James Rassmann<a1_0/>, <a2_0>a Green Beret advisor<a2_0/> who was aboard Kerry's <a0_0>PCF-94<a0_0/>, was knocked overboard when, according to witnesses and the documentation of the event, a mine or rocket exploded close to the boat. According to the documentation for the event, Kerry's arm was injured when he was thrown against a bulkhead during the explosion. PCF 94 returned to the scene and Kerry rescued Rassmann who was receiving sniper fire from the water. Kerry received <a3_0>the Bronze Star Medal with Combat "V"<a3_0/> for "<a4_0>heroic achievement<a4_0/>", for his actions during this incident; he also received his third Purple Heart.
